items.title: EU Panel Clears Path for Updated Moderna COVID Vaccine

items.title: New Biologic Cleared for Severe Asthma and Nasal Polyps
items.description: Phase 3 studies point to sustained disease control in patients who remain symptomatic despite standard therapies. Medscape Medical News
